hero.title: Digital Goods Store & Premium Accounts
hero.description: Buy ready-made accounts, keys, licenses, and digital products at the best prices. Instant delivery, quality guarantee, and secure payments. Start shopping right now!

about.title: About Us
about.description: We specialize in selling digital goods: premium accounts, licenses, activation keys, and other digital products. What we offer: ‚úÖ Huge selection ‚úÖ Fast delivery ‚úÖ Quality guarantee ‚úÖ Secure payments Our goal: Make digital goods accessible to everyone at competitive prices.

access.title: Instant Delivery
access.description: All products are delivered instantly after payment. No waiting ‚Äî get access immediately.

pricing.title: Best Prices
pricing.description: We offer competitive prices across all digital product categories with no hidden fees.

refund.title: Quality Guarantee
refund.description: We guarantee the quality of every product. If something isn't right, we'll refund your money.

activation.title: Verified Products
activation.description: All products are verified before sale to ensure you receive only working items.

support.title: 24/7 Support
support.description: Our team works around the clock ‚Äî ready to help in English, Ukrainian, and Russian.

payment.title: Secure Payments
payment.description: Multiple payment methods, secure transactions, and protection of your data.

steps.title:
How to
Buy Products in 3 Steps
steps.description: The purchase process is simple and straightforward!

step1.title: How it works
step1.subdescription1: Browse the catalog and find what you need: accounts, keys, licenses, and more.
step1.subdescription2: Choose a convenient payment method from many available options. Fast, secure, and easy.
step1.subdescription3: Instant delivery after payment! All data will be sent to your email or in your personal account. No delays!

benefit1.title: Transparent Terms
benefit1.description: You set the price, we add markup. You receive the full amount.

benefit2.title: Fast Payouts
benefit2.description: Multiple withdrawal methods with minimal fees

benefit3.title: 24/7 Support
benefit3.description: Our team is always ready to help with any questions

payoutMethods.title: Payout Methods
payoutMethods.subtitle: Choose a convenient method ‚Äî it's simple. Start selling today ‚Äî setup takes 15 minutes

question1.question: How quickly will I start earning?
question1.answer: After registration and adding products, they will appear in the catalog immediately. First sales can start on the day of registration.

question2.question: What is the platform commission?
question2.answer: We add markup to your price. You receive the full amount you set. Transparent terms without hidden fees.

question3.question: How often can I withdraw funds?
question3.answer: You can request withdrawal at any time. Processing usually takes 1-3 business days.

question4.question: What to do in case of disputes with buyers?
question4.answer: Our support team will help resolve any situation. We strive for fair solutions for all parties.
